Detailed Description

Author:
Jack Owen Shelton CS4322 Project Predator VS. Prey Simulator.
Date:
Spring 2009Predator behavior for Predators that, unless really hungry, stay mostly still and wait for Prey to come to them.

void AmbushPredator::predatorNoticed ( Predator *  owner,
Prey *  spotter 
) [inline, virtual]

Special method used for updating when a Predator has been noticed by a Prey.

This method doesn't do anything for this PredatorBehavior.

Parameters:
owner The Predator using the PredatorBehavior.
spotter The Prey that noticed the Predator.

Implements PredatorBehavior.
